name: An Ode to Todd the Toad: Frogcare!
name_original: An Ode to Todd the Toad: Frogcare!
description:
Be a frog mom!

Play with your frogs in the nest mode. Name them, give them outfits, and let them play with the toys they found!

Protect your frogs in The Maze! With 1 or 2 players on keyboard, or a bunch of players on gamepad, smack away the wasps while your frogs eat flies. Don't let the wasps get to them!

- graphic design, game design, and code by Celeste "SodaPOP" Plank

- music by Grant Binkley and Carlos Najera
